mainText: Otoko Juku Gaiden Akashi Gōji Manga Ends. Spinoff series launched in 2016.

mainText: Chargeman Ken! Anime Gets Stage Musical Adaptation This Fall. Musical based on 1974 anime to run in Tokyo.

mainText: New Sailor Moon Stage Musical Delayed to Summer 2020. New musical is titled <cite>Kaguya-hime no Koibito</ciote>.

mainText: Death Stranding Game's Japanese Trailer Features Japanese Voice Overs. Margaret Qualley, Nicolas Winding Refn join as models; Kazuhiro Yamaji, Houchu Ohtsuka join Japanese dub.

mainText: Mary Skelter 2 Game's Switch Version Ships in Japan on August 22. Switch version's opening movie also steamed.

mainText: Carole & Tuesday Anime Adds 8 Cast Members. 8 new characters debuted in show's 8th episode on Wednesday.

mainText: London Detective Mysteria Game's PC Release Slated for Summer. Game shipped on PS Vita in December.

mainText: Senran Kagura Peach Ball Switch Game Launches on July 9 in N. America. PC release via Steam also slated for summer.

mainText: Senran Kagura Reflexions Game Heads to PC on June 24. Game launched digitally in the West on Switch last September.

mainText: Wizardry: Labyrinth of Lost Souls Game's PC Release Delayed. .

titleText: Date a Live: Rio Reincarnation Game's Western Release Delayed to July
mainText: Date a Live: Rio Reincarnation Game's Western Release Delayed to July. Game releases on July 23 in N. America, Steam; on July 26 in Europe.

titleText: World Trigger Manga Takes 1-Month Break Due to Author's Recovery from Surgery
mainText: World Trigger Manga Takes 1-Month Break Due to Author's Recovery from Surgery. Daisuke Ashihara recovers from complications from recent cholecystectomy; manga resumes in July.

titleText: Lapis x Labyrinth Game's Launch Trailer Streamed
mainText: Lapis x Labyrinth Game's Launch Trailer Streamed. Action RPG launched for PS4, Switch in N. America on Tuesday.

titleText: Spirited Away Gets 1st Theatrical Release in China
mainText: Spirited Away Gets 1st Theatrical Release in China. Academy Award-winning film is Studio Ghibli's 2nd to open in China.

mainText: Anime Expo Hosts Studio Saizensen Founder Toshinobu Kondō. Kondō worked on <cite>Umihara Kawase</cite> games, <Cite>Stellvia</cite> anime.

mainText: Live-Action Gisō Furin Series Reveals 7 More Cast Members. Toshiki Seto, Shosuke Tanihara, Megumi, Michiko Tanaka, Natsuko, Hiroshi Izawa, Mayumi Asaka join cast.

mainText: Brothers Conflict: Precious Baby Game Gets Switch Port. Franchise inspired TV anime in 2013.

mainText: Digimon Links Smartphone Game Ends Service in July. 3-vs-3 battle game launched in Japanese in 2016, in English in 2017.

mainText: Death Stranding PS4 Game's Trailer Reveals November 8 Release. Kojima Productions game's cast includes Norman Reedus, Lindsay Wagner, Léa Seydoux.

mainText: Root Letter: Last Answer Game Launches in Europe on August 30, in N. America on September 3. .

mainText: Crunchyroll Streams Dr. Stone Anime in July. TMS Entertainment produces adaptation of Riichirou Inagaki, Boichi's manga.

mainText: Tokyo Chronos Game Launches for PS VR on August 22. The official Twitter account for MyDearest's Tokyo Chronos VR visual novel project revealed on Wedesday that the game will launch physically and digitally....

mainText: Dropkick on My Devil! Manga Chapter With Knife Attack Pulled From Site. Removal follows Tuesday knife attack in Kawasaki.

mainText: Kochoki: Wakaki Nobunaga Anime Reveals 2nd Visual, July 8 Premiere. <cite>Hakuōki</cite> staff reunite for Studio DEEN's original TV series.

titleText: Funimation Acquires U.K. Anime Distributor Manga Entertainment
mainText: Funimation Acquires U.K. Anime Distributor Manga Entertainment. FunimationNow adds anime for streaming in U.K., Ireland in coming months.

titleText: Top-Selling Manga in Japan by Volume: 2019 (First Half)
mainText: Top-Selling Manga in Japan by Volume: 2019 (First Half). <cite>One Piece's</cite> 11th straight time at #1 with 2 books, followed by 2 <cite>Attack on Titan</cite>, 2 <cite>Kingdom</cite>, 3 <cite>My Hero Academia</cite>, 3 <cite>Promised Neverland</cite>.

titleText: Top-Selling Manga in Japan by Series: 2019 (First Half)
mainText: Top-Selling Manga in Japan by Series: 2019 (First Half). <cite>One Piece's</cite> 4th time at #1 with 5 million, followed by <cite>Promised Neverland, Kingdom, My Hero Academia, Quintessential Quintuplets</cite>.

mainText: Bandai Namco Amusement to Open 'Mazaria' VR Center in July. Guests to "enter world of anime, games" in Tokyo's former Shonen Jump theme park location.

mainText: For Whom The Alchemist Exists Anime Film Unveils New Visual. The official website for For Whom The Alchemist Exists, the theatrical film of The Alchemist Code (Ta ga Tame no Alchemist or For Whom the Alchemist) smartphone....

mainText: DeNA Develops Pokémon Masters Smartphone Game. Game featuring main series RPGs' Trainers slated for this year.

mainText: Pokémon Sleep App Tracks Player's Sleep Time. App to interact with new "Pokémon GO Plus +" accessory.

titleText: Pokémon Home Cloud Service Lets Players Trade Pokémon Across Games
mainText: Pokémon Home Cloud Service Lets Players Trade Pokémon Across Games. Slated for early 2020 on Switch, iOS, Android with link to Pokémon Bank.

mainText: Detective Pikachu Game Heading to Switch With New Ending. Different ending from live-action film, earlier 3DS release.

mainText: North American Anime, Manga Releases, May 26-June 1. <cite>Junji Ito Collection</cite>, <cite>Kampfer</cite> anime; <cite>I'm Standing on a Million Lives</cite>, <cite>Eve and Eve</cite> manga ship.

mainText: Makoto Shinkai's Weathering With You Film Reveals 2nd Teaser Video, More Cast. Shun Oguri, Tsubasa Honda, Chieko Baisho, Sakura Kiryū, Sei Hiraizumi, Yuuki Kaji join cast.

mainText: Jump Force Game's Trailer Previews 3 DLC Characters. Seto Kaibe, All Might, Biscuit Krueger launch as DLC characters.
